details.ingredients: Soy Protein, Pea Protein, Coconut Oil, Spices, Salt, Garlic, Natural Smoke Flavor
details.description: Vegan's Sausages are the perfect plant-based alternative to traditional sausages. Ideal for grilling, sandwiches, or breakfast meals.
details.instructions: Store in a refrigerator. Once opened, consume within 3 days. Do not freeze. Cook on medium heat for 5 minutes until browned.

details.ingredients: Textured Soy Protein, Pea Protein, Onion Powder, Black Pepper, Salt, Beetroot Extract
details.description: Vegan's Minced Meat is a fantastic meat alternative, perfect for making burgers, tacos, and pasta dishes. Rich in protein and full of flavor!
details.instructions: Keep refrigerated. Once opened, consume within 2 days. Do not freeze. Pan-fry for 5-8 minutes or use in your favorite recipes.
